name: Particle Theory
description:
In Particle Theory, your role is to build towers in order to defend against disruptive particles that are attacking your energy source. You can build towers by clicking on their icons and then on the map tiles. Building towers will use cosmic quantum currency (CQC). You can also upgrade or sell your existing towers by clicking on them. If your energy source goes to zero, the game will be over.  Make sure to play on full screen for the best experience.

Bugs are expected and your feedback, in order to improve, will be appreciated.

Thanks for playing.
